headline: Sysco to Webcast Presentation at: Barclays 18th Annual Global Consumer Staples Conference and Wells Fargo 8th Annual Consumer Conference
summary: HOUSTON, Aug. 26, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Sysco Corporation (NYSE:SYY) today announced that the Company will webcast its presentation from the Barclays 18th Annual Global Consumer Staples Conference on Wednesday, Sept. 3, at 11:15 a.m. ET. Additionally, the Company will also webcast its presentation at the Wells Fargo 8th Annual Consumer Conference on Tuesday, Sept. 16, at 8:00 a.m. PST. The live webcast for each of these events can be accessed at investors.sysco.com. An archived replay of the
